WorkItem.Description:
Using the resto shaman config (haven't tested with others) when I select to filter out "Misc" off-hands and only leave shields selected as soon as I click apply.  I lose a bunch of things that have nothing to do with off hands.  For example, all rings except the rings that I currently have equipped disappear as selections.  I have confirmed it is the offhand.  I tried unchecking just one things at a time until I narrowed it down to this item, as soon as you reselect "misc" off-hands the items come back.
Â 
It seems to be affecting rings, trinkets, back, and neck.
WorkItem.Summary: Uncheck offhand other lose rings, etc
